verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From over hill and plain There comes the signal strain, ’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ; Its music rolls along, The hills take up the song, Of loyalty, loyalty, Yes, loyalty to Christ.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: “On to victory! On to victory!” Cries our great Commander “On!” We’ll move at His command, We’ll soon possess the land, Thro' loyalty, loyalty, Yes, loyalty to Christ.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O hear, ye brave, the sound That moves the earth around, ’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ; Arise to dare and do, Ring out the watchword true, Of loyalty, loyalty, Yes, loyalty to Christ.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Come, join our loyal throng, We’ll rout the giant wrong, ’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ; Where Satan’s banners float We’ll send the bugle note, Of loyalty, loyalty, Yes, loyalty to Christ.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The strength of youth we lay At Jesus’ feet today, ’Tis loyalty, loyalty, loyalty to Christ; His Gospel we’ll proclaim, Thro'out the world’s domain, Of loyalty, loyalty, Yes, loyalty to Christ. Amen.
